CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Areas_of_Coverage__c), NULL, SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Garbage Room"), "Salle de déchets; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Storage"), "Entreposage; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Kitchen"), "Cuisine; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Bar"), "Bar; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Electrical and Mechanical Room French"), "Salle électrique et mécanique; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Kitchenettes"), "Cuisinettes; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Offices"), "Bureaux; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Lunch Room"), "Cafétéria; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Manufacturing"), "Fabrication; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Warehouse"), "Entrepôt; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Shipping/Receiving"), "Expédition/Réception; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Chute Rooms"), "Salles de chutes; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Areas_of_Coverage__c, "Other"), Areas_of_Coverage_Other__c, NULL) + ".", "; .", NULL))
CustomField.label: Areas of Coverage Summary French
